{"id":1367357946,"question_id":3534,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1724555803,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"260 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1367357946/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Almost Equal Pairs I","memory":"58.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countPairs(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        map<long long, int> m;\n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            ans += m[1LL*nums[i]];\n            string s = \"000000\" + to_string(nums[i]);\n            for (int a=0; a<(int)s.size(); a++) {\n                for (int b=0; b<a; b++) {\n                    string t = s;\n                    swap(t[a], t[b]);\n                    if (stoll(t, nullptr, 10) != stoll(s, nullptr, 10))\n                        m[stoll(t, nullptr, 10)]++;\n                }\n            }\n            m[nums[i]]++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-almost-equal-pairs-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
